doc.previous: A matrix that is not diagonalizable is said to be defective For defective matrices the notion of eigenvector can be generalized to generalized eigenvectors and that of diagonal matrix to a Jordan form matrix Over an algebraically closed field any matrix has a Jordan form and therefore admits a basis of generalized eigenvectors and a decomposition into generalized eigenspaces
